radiographic_examinations.findings: Diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon with evidence of wall thickening and fat stranding, compatible with abscess; a rim enhancing fluid collection measuring 1.2 x 0.9 x 1.3 cm was noted. No evidence of drainable fluid collection or free intraperitoneal air. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits with a calcified pleural plaque along the left hemidiaphragm, indicative of prior asbestos exposure. No evidence of other abnormalities in the liver, pancreas, spleen, kidneys, or urinary tract.
